import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col,ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import Message from '../components/Message'; const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
